plot: Actors and actresses look back over the history of how a Shakespeare character has been played and then act their own interpretation of a key scene.
plot_en: Actors and actresses look back over the history of how a Shakespeare character has been played and then act their own interpretation of a key scene.
plot_es: Actors and actresses look back over the history of how a Shakespeare character has been played and then act their own interpretation of a key scene.
title: Shakespeare Shorts
